languages.text: {n}Отняв руку от клавиш, он привлекает вас к себе уверенным и сильным движением. Клавиши под весом вашего тела издают пронзительный вскрик. Соломон дарит вам белоснежную улыбку.{/n} "Я рад, что ты дал{mf||а} мне еще один шанс".

{n}He takes his hand away from the keys and draws you to him in a confident and powerful motion. The keys let out a piercing shriek under the weight of your body. Solomorne gifts you with a dazzlingly white smile.{/n} "I'm glad you gave me another chance."
languages.original_text: {n}Отняв руку от клавиш, он привлекает вас к себе уверенным и сильным движением. Клавиши под весом вашего тела издают пронзительный вскрик. Соломон дарит вам белоснежную улыбку.{/n} "Я рад, что ты дал{mf||а} мне еще один шанс".

traits.locale_text: {n}When you take your hand away from the keys, he draws you to him in a confident and powerful motion. The keys let out a piercing shriek under the weight of your body. Solomorne gifts you with a dazzlingly white smile.{/n} "I'm glad you gave me another chance."

{n}When you take your hand away from the keys, he draws you to him in a confident and powerful motion. The keys let out a piercing shriek under the weight of your body. Solomorne gifts you with a dazzlingly white smile.{/n} "I'm glad you gave me another chance."

{n}When you take your hand away from the keys, he draws you to him in a confident and powerful motion. The keys let out a piercing shriek under the weight of your body. Solomorne gifts you with a dazzlingly white smile.{/n} "I'm glad you gave me another chance."

{n}He takes his hand away from the keys and draws you to him in a confident and powerful motion. The keys let out a piercing shriek under the weight of your body. Solomorne gifts you with a dazzlingly white smile.{/n} "I'm glad you gave me another chance."

{n}He takes his hand away from the keys and draws you to him in a confident and powerful motion. The keys let out a piercing shriek under the weight of your body. Solomorne gifts you with a dazzlingly white smile.{/n} "I'm glad you gave me another chance."

languages.text: {n}彼は鍵盤から手を離し、自信と力強さを込めた動きであなたを引き寄せた。あなたの体重を受けて、鍵盤が鋭く悲鳴を上げる。ソロモーンは眩しいほどに輝く微笑みをあなたに向けた。{/n}「再びチャンスをいただけて嬉しく思います」
languages.original_text: {n}He takes his hand away from the keys and draws you to him in a confident and powerful motion. The keys let out a piercing shriek under the weight of your body. Solomorne gifts you with a dazzlingly white smile.{/n} "I'm glad you gave me another chance."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は鍵盤から手を離し、自信と力強さを込めた動きであなたを引き寄せた。あなたの体重を受けて、鍵盤が鋭く悲鳴を上げる。ソロモーンは眩しいほどに輝く微笑みをあなたに向けた。{/n}「再びチャンスをいただけて嬉しく思います」

languages.text: {n}Er nimmt seine Hand von den Tasten und zieht dich mit einer selbstbewussten und starken Bewegung an sich. Unter dem Gewicht deines Körpers kreischen die Tasten durchdringend auf. Solomorne schenkt dir ein irritierend breites Lächeln.{/n} "Ich bin froh, dass Ihr mir eine weitere Chance gegeben habt."
languages.original_text: {n}He takes his hand away from the keys and draws you to him in a confident and powerful motion. The keys let out a piercing shriek under the weight of your body. Solomorne gifts you with a dazzlingly white smile.{/n} "I'm glad you gave me another chance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er nimmt seine Hand von den Tasten und zieht dich mit einer selbstbewussten und starken Bewegung an sich. Unter dem Gewicht deines Körpers kreischen die Tasten durchdringend auf. Solomorne schenkt dir ein irritierend breites Lächeln.{/n} "Ich bin froh, dass Ihr mir eine weitere Chance gegeben habt."

languages.text: {n}Il ôte sa main du clavier et vous attire à lui en un geste plein d'assurance et de puissance contenue. L'orgue émet un hurlement strident sous le poids de votre corps et Solomorne vous adresse un sourire à la blancheur étincelante.{/n} « Je suis ravi que vous m'ayez donné une seconde chance. »
languages.original_text: {n}He takes his hand away from the keys and draws you to him in a confident and powerful motion. The keys let out a piercing shriek under the weight of your body. Solomorne gifts you with a dazzlingly white smile.{/n} "I'm glad you gave me another chance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il ôte sa main du clavier et vous attire à lui en un geste plein d'assurance et de puissance contenue. L'orgue émet un hurlement strident sous le poids de votre corps et Solomorne vous adresse un sourire à la blancheur étincelante.{/n} « Je suis ravi que vous m'ayez donné une seconde chance. »

languages.text: {n}Aparta la mano del teclado y te atrae hacia él con un tirón enérgico y decidido. Las teclas emiten un quejido estridente bajo el peso de tu cuerpo. Solomorne te regala con una sonrisa deslumbrante.{/n} «Me alegro de que me haya dado otra oportunidad».
languages.original_text: {n}He takes his hand away from the keys and draws you to him in a confident and powerful motion. The keys let out a piercing shriek under the weight of your body. Solomorne gifts you with a dazzlingly white smile.{/n} "I'm glad you gave me another chance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aparta la mano del teclado y te atrae hacia él con un tirón enérgico y decidido. Las teclas emiten un quejido estridente bajo el peso de tu cuerpo. Solomorne te regala con una sonrisa deslumbrante.{/n} «Me alegro de que me haya dado otra oportunidad».

languages.text: {n}一曲结束，他将你的手从琴键上挪开，双手以有力的动作，充满自信地你拉到他身边。在你身体的重压之下，琴键发出了刺耳的尖叫声，而索罗蒙对你露出了纯洁的笑容，宛如阳光一样耀眼。{/n}“我很庆幸，那时你又给了我一次机会。”
languages.original_text: {n}He takes his hand away from the keys and draws you to him in a confident and powerful motion. The keys let out a piercing shriek under the weight of your body. Solomorne gifts you with a dazzlingly white smile.{/n} "I'm glad you gave me another chance."

traits.locale_text: {n}一曲结束，他将你的手从琴键上挪开，双手以有力的动作，充满自信地你拉到他身边。在你身体的重压之下，琴键发出了刺耳的尖叫声，而索罗蒙对你露出了纯洁的笑容，宛如阳光一样耀眼。{/n}“我很庆幸，那时你又给了我一次机会。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, tuşlardan elini çekip kuvvetli bir hareketle seni kendine çekiyor. Tuşlar bedeninin ağırlığı altında tiz bir çığlık koparıyor. Solomorne, baş döndürücü bir sırıtış eşliğinde konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu ikinci şansa sahip olduğum için mutluyum."
languages.original_text: {n}He takes his hand away from the keys and draws you to him in a confident and powerful motion. The keys let out a piercing shriek under the weight of your body. Solomorne gifts you with a dazzlingly white smile.{/n} "I'm glad you gave me another chance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne tuşlardan elini çekip seni kendine kuvvetli bir hareketle çeker. Tuşlar bedeninin ağırlığı altında tiz bir çığlık koparır. Solomorne baş döndürücü bir sırıtışla konuşur.{/n} "Bana ikinci bir şans verdiğiniz için çok mutluyum."

languages.original_text: {n}He takes his hand away from the keys and draws you to him in a confident and powerful motion. The keys let out a piercing shriek under the weight of your body. Solomorne gifts you with a dazzlingly white smile.{/n} "I'm glad you gave me another chance."
